label: OpenClaws Agent Lifecycle
description: Five-phase governance lifecycle for sovereign OpenClaw AI agents â€” from spawn through decommission.

phases.name: Agent Spawn
phases.description: Agent initialization, identity assignment, and capability declaration.

phases.name: Task Intake
phases.description: Agent receives and validates task backlog items.

phases.name: Active Execution
phases.description: Agent executes assigned tasks, emitting heartbeats and advisory drafts.

phases.name: Gate Review
phases.description: Human-in-the-loop review of agent output before phase advancement.

phases.name: Decommission
phases.description: Agent wind-down, final audit log entry, and unlink from project.
